downloader_error_link_nf: ⚠️ Can't find a link to the source. Use /help_dl for help.
downloader_error_source_ns: ⚠️ The source is not supported. Use /help_dl for help.
downloader_desc_dl: Downloads videos from popular social networks like TikTok, Instagram, and Threads.
downloader_tags_dl: download, video, tiktok, instagram, threads, media, reels, saver
downloader_help_dl: 🎬 Download Command /dl /download This command allows you to download videos/audio from supported platforms — TikTok, Instagram, and Threads. ✅ Features: • Paste a link to a video post. • The bot automatically detects the platform. • Returns a direct video file or download link. • Supports Instagram, Threads any posts, and TikTok videos. ℹ️ Notes: • No login or API key required.
